@21WIRE says…

Anywhere you see the phrase, "the New Normal" – you should reject it. It's based on fraudulent premise that #COVID19 Link: https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID19?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw is somehow fundamentally much greater threat than other infectious diseases, when it's not.

Anyone pushing this should be confronted and publically admonished.
